medical_history.chief_complaint: 24-year-old man with familial cardiomyopathy seeking genetic counseling and cardiac evaluation for family planning.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed heart failure due to dilated cardiomyopathy early in childhood and underwent orthotopic cardiac transplantation at age 3. He has been doing well since then.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Heart failure due to dilated cardiomyopathy, orthotopic cardiac transplantation at age 3.
medical_history.family_history: His oldest sister died at age 4 from heart failure. A second sister died perinatally of unknown causes. A younger brother is well at age 22, while another sister died at age 2 from heart failure during evaluation for cardiac transplantation. The youngest sister is well at age 18. The mother is in good health with no known heart problems. Father's health is unknown beyond age 35, with no history of heart failure, sudden cardiac death, muscular dystrophy, or early-onset hearing loss reported in grandparents or cousins.
